Replay.IO

Class DataStringCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • Replay.IO.DataStringCodec

  • public final class DataStringCodec
extends java.lang.Object
    Library for encoding/decoding String types as used in osu! Replay files.

    See reference page for more detail.

                                                   java.util.function.Function<E,java.lang.String> encoder)
        Encodes a list of values to a osu! Replay string.
        Type Parameters:
        E - type of the list items.
        Parameters:
        items - list of items to encode.
        encoder - function to turn the item into a String.
        Returns:
        a osu! Replay string encoding of the items list.

      • parseLifeBarSample

        public static LifeBarSample parseLifeBarSample(java.lang.String input)
        Decodes a Replay.LifeBarSample tuple value from a string.
        Parameters:
        input - a string with a single LifeBarSample tuple encoding.
        Returns:
        the decoded tuple.

      • encodeLifeBarSample

        public static java.lang.String encodeLifeBarSample(LifeBarSample sample)
        Encodes a Replay.LifeBarSample tuple value into a string.

        Preserves four decimal places in the x and y coordinate values.

        Parameters:
        sample - the lifebar sample instance to encode.
        Returns:
        the string representation of the LifeBarSample

      • parseMoment

        Returns:
        the decoded tuple.

      • encodeMoment

        public static java.lang.String encodeMoment(Moment moment)
        Encodes a Replay.Moment tuple value into a string.

        Preserves four decimal places in the x and y coordinate values.

        Parameters:
        moment - the moment instance to encode.
        Returns:
        the string representation of the Moment
